allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add server-side authentication for admin panel

- Move login credentials to Google Apps Script \(hidden from browser\)
- Add handleLogin function for secure authentication
- Remove hardcoded password from admin.html
- Add loading spinner during login verification

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
